items.summary: Remove the "Contact Us Today" button from the homepage Hero section so only the "Schedule a Consultation" CTA remains.

Update the homepage "Our Approach" cards to (1) replace the numeric labels with icons in a style consistent with the rest of the website, (2) use a white card background, (3) apply a permanent gold border using the site’s existing gold theme color, and (4) add an on-click subtle upward-lift interaction that does not change the border color on click.

Update the homepage "How It Works" section so each step’s number appears outside of (separate from) the text box/card, with the number shown first and then the bordered text box. Apply a gold border to the step text boxes using the site’s existing gold theme color.
